about_the_game:
Let otherworldly sounds of Hob cocoon your ears. The music is evocative of the mystery, beauty, and uniqueness of the world of Hob. Featuring fretless bass and Moog guitar by Matt Uelmen, one of the masters of video game composition.

1. Samba
2. Forest
3. Prisex
4. Valisita
5. Saturnesse
6. In The Tank
7. Tower
8. Cenotaph
9. Anima
10. Gemini

Hob Official Sountrack

Produced, Composed, and Performed by Matt Uelmen, Los Angeles, 6/2015 - 7/2017
Mastering by Erica Escamez
